metadata.synopsis: The hostages react to one of the group's death, but resolve to keep going for their sake.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Plays automatically if any one prisoner in the group dies. The others react.Grouped the Group4 and Group5 prisoners together since they are in the same room.

0.speaker: Thindo Vintervur
0.text: I will tell your story, Santoria! Thindo Vintervur will LIVE ON!

1.speaker: Santoria
1.text: Is he - yeah. Dead. No use waiting about.
1.context: NodeContext: not as bothered as you might expect
